textContent:
What made our relationship so great in the beginning, and where did it go off the rails? 

The very beginning we focused on each other. Focused on you with all of my focus and energy on our hikes. Our walks are exploring our food, our eating. You focused on me with your attention and questions and curiosities and joys. 

And where went off the rails is where my focus changed. My focus changed from you to me. Had changed because I still was craving validation from everyone around me. I was craving validation from my work. Was Kevin validation from Friends. I was craving validation from school. And I was craving validation from you. But the validation craving is a focus on me. Not a focus on you. 

And as I reflect on where I'm at today, I realize the trauma and dysfunction is coming from where my focus has been versus where it's been. Sometimes that you feel versus you saying what you need.
